data.name: The Creation of a Self Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is the Memory Creation Demo for The Creation of a Self. In this demo you can get an overall feel for the game as well as create a self, program its first memory and see the creation of a memory monster.

The Creation of a Self is a love letter to 80s and 90s retro computing. A game that intersects poetry, programming, computers, love, death, freedom and living. Create a new self, program its memories, and destroy memory monsters created from those memories.

Things to try in this demo:
- Create a new self, program its first memory, and see the creation of a memory monster.
- Build and write your own memories with the New Memory Creator and copy them to the clipboard in the Created Memories menu.
- Play with the Memory Stream from the main menu and try out some cool and interesting effects.
- Type out 'commands' within the Created Memories and Self Collection menus! Connect to the Quotes-BBS! And guess the root password.

Stay up to date for future demos which will include the 2D runner, puzzles, and FPS levels.

Also, don't forget to check out different themes on the game's homepage on the World Wide Web!

http://mavenmob.com/self
